import { React, useState } from 'react' import image from '../../images/office-2.jpeg' import Button from '../../components/Button/Button' import Form from '../../components/Form/Form' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SignUp() { const [pass, setPass] = useState('password') const [eye, setEye] = useState('fa-eye') return (

Welcome to Office Administration System

We make job life easy for everone

{ if (pass === 'password') { setPass('text') } else { setPass('password') setEye('fa-eye-slash') } }}>
) } export default SignUp
